special_abilities.name: Water Walk
special_abilities.desc: Gar can stand and move on liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground.

special_abilities.name: Watery Fall
special_abilities.desc: When Gar drops to 0 hit points, his body collapses into a pool of inky water that rapidly disperses. Anything he was wearing or carrying is left behind.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Gar makes two melee attacks, one with his claw and one with Drown.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until the grapple ends, Gar canâ€™t attack other creatures with his claw.

actions.name: Drown
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.
